website_summaries.verdict: This aptly named tear stain remover is solid choice if you're having a tough time keeping the folds of your wrinkly faced pooch healthy and stain free.
pros: Boasts antibacterial and antifungal properties to keep creases clean and healthy
Zinc oxide and coconut oil repel moisture
Limited ingredients reduce the likelihood of adverse reactions
Along with regular cleaning, it works to heal raw, irritated skin while also clearing up stubborn tear stains
cons: Thick consistency can be difficult to spread

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cream if used faitfhfully every day!
customer_reviews.text: Started using Squishface Wrinkle Paste every night, faithfully since June 7, 2018, now in just 2 short months Rosoce's tear stain is completely gone!!!! Rosoce will be turning 8 months old this month, and I tried everything from bottle water, no tap water, grain free food, ceramic bowls (not stainless steel) and even the Angel Eyes powder and Angel Eyes chewables... NOTHING WORKED. (his stain was super dark by the time he was 4 or 5 months old.) Squishfave Wrinkle cream is an amazing product that truly works!!! I highly recommend!!! Proof is in the pics!!! Stain is gone, gone gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Pantalone

customer_reviews.title: First product that worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: We saw this product recommended on Facebook and we were hesitant. We have tried many products to remove tear stains from our English Bulldog's face and none worked. There were always positive reviews for these other wipes, shampoo's, and supplements, but none were working. This was the first thing that we could really say is working for us. Each dog is different. This product might not work for you. But it works for us and we will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: M Felix

customer_reviews.title: Works great for tear stains!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for my two Maltipoos who have tear stains. It works better than anything we have tried. It protects the skin and fur and also seems to reduce the amount of tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete game changer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old 70lb English bulldog. He’s alwasy had odor from his wrinkles. Used it on his wrinkles 2-3 times the smell is completely gone. I’ve been using wet wipes for years to clean the area but it never got rid of the odor the way Wrinkle paste does. I’ll be using this for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kpop

customer_reviews.title: It works!  It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: We were at our wits end on what could possibly help clear up the bad tear stains and awful odor for our 4yr old English Bulldog until my husband came across this product. Wow! I was skeptical as usual, but after only applying it 3 times, his face looks better and the smell is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit unsure since it doesn’t have reviews but I’m glad I pulled the trigger
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This stuff actually works! I was a bit unsure since it doesn’t have reviews but I’m glad I pulled the trigger. My poor bulldogs wrinkles were red, stinky and irritated and he was constantly trying to scratch them to relieve the itch. His face smelled like an abandoned bread factory! He wasn’t a fan at first but quickly forgot about the cream stuck between his face wrinkles after I gave him a treat reward for his troubles. I first applied it two days ago and then again yesterday and the skin between the wrinkles is almost healed up! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Winzenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great product for tear stains!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product to help with my Dalmatian’s tear stains & it’s working very well. I clean the area first, let the fur dry, then apply the cream. We still have a bit of a ways to go since the already stained fur needs to grow out & get trimmed away some more, but this is already making a HUGE difference. I’m very impressed and happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: TaraAnnG

customer_reviews.title: Our bulldog hates how much he loves it
customer_reviews.text: We have a very itchy bulldog and because of his shape he can really only scratch his face, so he goes to town rubbing his eye wrinkles. We put this stuff in his wrinkles and he immediately stops the rubbing and scratching and calms down. I think this stuff really helps to heal the irritation too, in less than a day he will go from bright red irritation back to pink. We put it between his toes too because he licks his feet incessantly and it calms it right down. We're relatively new to bulldog care and this stuff is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Butts

customer_reviews.title: Fast Acting!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised at how fast this worked on my bull dogs nose. She had the most awful smell that I could not get rid of. I ordered this because of the before and after photos of another bully. After cleaning her nose with baby wipes I applied the Squishface. My Maisey did not rub her face into the carpet to try to get rid of it. A very pleasant surprise. I checked the fold the next afternoon and all of the "ick" was completely gone. I will always keep this product on hand. I just wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Mel White

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Wrinkle Paste when my 7 year old Old English Bulldog started having issues with redness and irritation in his facial wrinkles. The paste was easy to apply, and I only had to use a little bit to coat the problem areas. After two days of use, the irritation was significantly reduced, and after five days his face was back to normal! I plan on using the paste every few days to clean his wrinkles and keep the problem from coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product after reading all of the great reviews. I wish I would have read the one star reviews first though. This cream did not work on either of our french bulldogs. Not in the slightest. It also unfortunately caused a allergic reaction of my female. The allergic reaction I know isn’t the companies fault but still unsettling for a product that didn’t work in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improvement after only a few days of use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit, my dogs do hate this. It definitely has helped my English Bulldog’s face wrinkles. Before using this, inside the wrinkle above his nose would become slimy almost everyday - he hates having it cleaned, hates the paste...but it is helping. It’s helped to lessen the darkness in the fur under there as well, and helped to stop the slimy stuff that he gets in there. While I’ve only had this for a few days - I can already see a huge difference. I’m looking forward to the final result which others have achieved that I’ve read about in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: mrscollins

customer_reviews.title: Pinky is no longer stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our pug, Pinky, who has had the nastiest stink coming from her wrinkle since we adopted her 8 months ago. We have bathed, used medicated wipes and honestly, nothing lasted for more than 12 hours and then the stink was back. I work at a veterinary office so I tried pretty much every appropriate option. I saw this product while browsing and thought the name was cute and then I saw the great reviews and thought maybe we should try it out. This stuff is a miracle! I have applied a small amount daily to her face folds and the stank is gone. She also appreciates that the product is not scented. I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: jeff cohn

customer_reviews.title: Once or twice will do!
customer_reviews.text: I have an English Bulldog and she has a tail pocket that gets irritated from time to time but she is not a big fan of having someone mess with it. I can wash it and put this on and it only takes once or twice and it is better! Really sold on this. It also works on the tear folds on her face. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Ranchwife

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my Maltese mix tear stains
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltese mix. I brought her to the groomers, and then dutifully put the cream on the right side and left the other side alone every night for a month. It works a little bit, but not enough to recommend for tear stains. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosee Posey

customer_reviews.title: First thing that seems to help.
customer_reviews.text: Lily has a problem with her eyes watering. This leads to wet tear stains that encourage fungus and irritation which is painful for her. I keep the hair trimmed and use eyedrops but was still having trouble. This cream soothes her skin and seems to have kept the fungus from growing. Doesn't matter that she doesn't have wrinkles. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.s reads.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on folds
customer_reviews.text: Works great on folds, creases, tear stains, tail pockets, you name it!!! If it gets red, irritated, rashed or otherwise this stuff works, I even use it under my Bulldogs chin from his sloppy drinking. If you own a dog with skin folds, you can't go wrong supporting this Made in the USA product!!! D.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl L Young

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I like all positive reviews and wanted to give it a try. I just don't find it convenient. I have a puppy English bulldog. We are still training her to stay still allowing us to wash the face and wrinkles. Then no matter how long I knead the tube its still separated. Squeeze a little onto your hand and its a glob of oil then some white paste. To get the most out of the paste we mix the oil back into the paste. All while a 3 month old English bulldog is pulling to hide her face. So as of now, this paste is not convenient. Emailed the company and got a generic reply. Its going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy, this stuff is MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so well!!! My English bulldogs face wrinkles were red, wet, smelly, oozy, and irritated. He was constantly trying to scratch his face. After TWO applications, the redness is gone! The smell is gone! And it’s dry and overall it’s looking so much better! The usual daily buildup of gunk is gone! Thank you so much for a great product that works!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully! Marge approves!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! For so long I had been using organic diaper rash cream in between the folds to keep them dry (especially during the summer months when Marge likes to swim a lot). This stuff sticks MUCH better, has a nice thick texture and has zero scent. She does not mind me applying it at all AND doesn’t immediately go run away after and try to rub it off! Also, a little goes a VERY long way! Great product and definitely recommend for all you wrinkly pup parents out there!
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: "Zinc Oxide" Baby diaper rash ointment
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after reading all the reviews, I ordered this for our Bulldog which tends to get the typical redness in his nose wrinkles/rope. I applied it as described in directions, found not much improvement after about a week, after further inspection of product and ingredients "zinc oxide" it is very comparable to baby diaper rash ointment. Sent back for refund not worth the $20.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product. Works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: On my second purchase. This product is amazing. I use it on my all white 6 year old English Bulldog Bruce. Of course, with bulldogs having a lot of wrinkles, they need a lot more attention. This product has made it easier for me to keep up with his white coat. Anyone who is trying to get rid of tear stains, this is the perfect product with that. You will be satisfied with the way this product works. I can’t live without it anymore. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for a month before concluding that it does not work on tear stains, atleast not my English Bulldogs. I applied this product loyally everynight after his nightly wipe down on my Dogs tear stains, nose wrinkle and under his chin....these are his main problem areas. At first it appeared to work after a week but soon fizzled out on any results. A reviewer on here mentioned the ingredients are similar to baby diaper rash cream and they are absolutely right!! So I don’t know how all these other reviewers are praising this product, my only conclusion is all dog tear stains are not the same. So off I go on the search for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5.0

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give it a try...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews we decided to give it a try. This has really helped our Frenchie as he was really losing a lot of hair around his eye area. He seems to be very itchy and often rubs his face on the carpet etc. We have been using it just before bed and it has really helped soothe his eye and above nose area and stimulate hair regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: It really does work. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am super surprised by how well this stuff works. I was using ointment wipes for my frenchies wrinkles before and they really didn't do much. Plus, it was extra steps cuz I would have to dry them afterward too. I saw this on amazon and was a bit hesitant to buy it cuz it is very pricey, but I am so glad I did. My dog's wrinkles look 100x better! It's also less hassle cuz i just wipe it in the crevices and leave it alone. I could literally tell the difference after one use, the next morning. Only advice I'd guve new users is be consistent. You must use it everyday to see permanent/long lasting results.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is miracle paste!!! Game changer...
customer_reviews.text: This is miracle paste!!! I had my reservations as I have tried countless products from our vet, recommendations, etc... We have an American Bulldog, with emphasis on the bulldog traits. And man oh man has this paste been a complete game changer. I use this in all the "trouble" areas, and noticed an immediate improvement. Beyond impressed. My only complaint is that I did not make this discovery sooner. Highly, highly, recommend this product! It has been such a blessing for my lil' squishy puppy face. 🐶🐾👏🏻⭐⭐⭐⭐👏🏻🥰
customer_reviews.author: A. Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is expensive for just 2OZ..AND..Almost exactly the same as Desitin diaper rash creme???
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this on my little apricot poodle so can't tell yet how it will work BUT. Does anyone else think this looks just like Desitin baby rash ointment? Almost same ingredients too & it's only about $12.00 for 16 OZ...!!!
customer_reviews.author: LinnaKay

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Bull Dog Owners
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a must for bull dog owners! Our English bulldog had terrible folds. We've tried everything from changing food, adding supplements into her diet, and just about every fold cleaner out there. Within a day, this paste made her folds 75% less raw. I'll update my review after we've been using it for a while but for now - I am so excited we found this product!
customer_reviews.author: KristinTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Squishface wrinkle paste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! It works great on my bulldog's folds and tail pocket. Highly recommend this product. Best effective product I have found. I will never switch products. This keeps his skin healthy and free of infection. I apply this sparingly in the folds after area is cleaned with over the counter lubricant eye drop solution and dried thoroughly. I have also used a little in other areas where I see some irritation and it is entirely gone the next day. Just cant say enough about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Healed folds right up!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an English bulldog that has extremely deep wrinkles. It is so hard to keep them dry and clean. I used this cream for 3 days in a row and it was like night and day. The discoloration had gone away and 3 out of the four wrinkles were completely cleared up and the super deep wrinkle was nearly dry also. I was a little shocked by the small size of the tube for the cost, but the quality made me forget about the price. I will definitely keep this on hand and continue to use it on both my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: RDaye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent, prevents eye boogers and moisture from staying
customer_reviews.text: My french bulldog tends to get BAD tear stains. If used daily, this can really help prevent further damage, just not sure about removing them. We use a tear stain remover was when we bathe him, and apply this after, then daily from there. Make sure you really rub it into the skin. My only complaint is that it has separated in the tube in about a month, and you can tell when it starts to wear off on his face because you see little white stuff. Also, dont apply on the nose unless you want them to look like theyre headed to the beach, it remains white.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works great, helps keep our pugs wrinkles dry!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this stuff and a little goes a long way!! We use Nootie Antimicrobial Wipes to clean out our pugs deep wrinkles and his paws, and then we put the wrinkle paste in his wrinkles, and even though his eyes constantly water his wrinkles stay dry for 2 days! We used to have to follow him around drying out his wrinkles all day to keep him from getting infection, and clean once a day... now we clean with the wipes, and the paste and repeat the process again in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: AndreB

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it more than 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I went to the vet regarding the yeast in my dog’s facial wrinkles. No matter how much I washed/dried them out or used medicated wipes (for almost a year), it never went away. I then came across this wrinkle paste and gave it a shot. I could see results even after using it one day! I could not (and still can’t) believe that it works so well and quick. As close to instant gratification that you can get with this situation. I just wish I had found this product sooner. Well worth the money and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: So far the best wrinkle cream
customer_reviews.text: Gracie is our third bulldog and we've dealt with lots of skin issues. I've had prescription creams and powders and this wrinkle cream works even better than prescriptions. After just one application, her nose fold looks fantastic! After day 2, it's almost all cleared up. I highly recommend that you give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: SuzLopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for my bully
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my English Bulldog, Tidus, everyday. It keeps his face from itching. Whenever I forget to use it, inevitably he will rub his face on the carpet because moisture from his tears gets down into his wrinkles. To use this product, I use a clean warm washcloth to gently wash around his eyes and folds, then I pat dry with a clean towel and apply the product around each of the areas. Tidus' face stays white and itch-free. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pug owner must have
customer_reviews.text: We literally tried everything our vet recommended for keeping wrinkles clean and keeping them from getting sore. This stuff is great, we applied it like usual after we cleaned his wrinkles and within hours there was a noticeable difference in the appearance of his wrinkles. They were often red and swollen from him itching it, being so close to his food and toys but thanks to this no more miserable pug.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle paste works for itchy tail pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I recently rescued my English bulldog from a shelter and with in a month I noticed he simultaneously had an infected tail pocket and leaky anal glands. I tried everything for his tail pocket like prescription wipes from the vet, baby wipes, holistic formula of coconut oil, lavender etc. Nothing worked. My last hope was the wrinkle paste. With in 3-4 days I noticed the redness in his tail pocket had gone away and there was no longer any residue when I would clean it out. It works! I definitely recommend this for infected/itchy tail pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My Frenchie puppy has a pretty dark stain by his eye, inside the crease it stays pretty moist. I’ve only had this less than a week but putting the cream in his creases by his eye keeps it dry. I haven’t noticed the stain getting lighter but it hasn’t been that long yet. I do like that it is white so you can’t see the stain as much when you apply the paste. This is only 2oz and you only need a little bit each day but it does seem a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this cream
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cream. My bulldog actually enjoys when I apply it after his baths. It's extremely important to clean their wrinkles to keep them healthy and I can say with confidence that this works well for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Oskar

customer_reviews.title: Best Bulldog Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: Squishface Wrinkle Paste is an excellent product! In just two days we noticed great improvement in the irritated skin in our bulldog’s wrinkles. Often, his wrinkles would get so crusty they were hard to clean and keep clean. This product provides an excellent barrier that doesn’t allow any moisture from his eyes to build up and cause irritation of his skin. We are so thankful to have found this product!! It is easy to use and it doesn’t require much so the tube of Wrinkle Paste will last quite a while. Totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: jkr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for English Bulldogs!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a new fur mama to an English Bulldog pup! After watching many videos about maintenance of this breed, I came across a YouTube video of a fellow fur mama who used this product in her daily maintenance routine of her English Bulldog. She stated that she applied this product to the wrinkles and tear stains daily for about 5 days and saw a dramatic difference supported with before and after pictures. I decided to give it a try. After even three days of application, I saw a difference in the tear stains on my pup! This is a wonderful product and I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle rojas

customer_reviews.title: Toxic even in small quantities
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my Frenchie who has horrible tear stains. I read reviews about Zinc being toxic and I assumed that he wouldn't ingest any of it because it would be near his eyes and small amounts. Well I put it on a he licked a very small amount like residue less than a smear and less than 5mins he vomited. I assumed he vomited due to something else so I tried product again another day and the exact same thing happened. I have decided to stop using the product. I would not recommend due to the zinc in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful. I have 6 bulldogs
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful. I have 6 bulldogs. Wouldn't be without. Does exactly what it says it does. I put it in their folds, any scratches or bites or irritation, by next day, big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: sheila cadmus

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get rid of the tear stains that my dog had and the first five days it didn't seem to work that well. The company contacted me via email and asked how it was doing. I told them and they said to give it a few more days. They contacted me again and this time it was working. Great product and great customer service after the purchase. I would definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Finally Something That Works!!
customer_reviews.text: After 7 years of trying all sorts of remedies to eliminate the awful color of my English Bulldog's facial folds, THIS WORKS!! We tried everything from medicated pads for humans, to "natural" remedies and nothing worked. The bacteria that grows in my dog's facial folds was causing inflammation so bad that she would literally hide when she saw us getting out her previous treatment(s). This has worked wonders for her.
customer_reviews.author: gmcgraw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My first order had to be returned due to product leaking out from opposite end into the shipping package. I was excited and looking forward to using on my bulldogs, but was completely surprised it's very thick and hard to use. When squeezing the tube oil comes out and there's no way to shake or mix. Just an awful mess to use. It also doesn't do what it says... destin works much better and is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi

customer_reviews.title: The best for tear stains
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie has very dark tear stains on the left I bought this product after reading all the good reviews and to be honest, this is a really great product. My puppies tear stains nearly are gone. I wipe dogs tear stains daily and massage just a small amount of the paste on the area affected by the tear stains and works wonders. I also recognize most ingredients so that’s a plus as well! Hasn’t irritated his eyes yet!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Tapia

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give it 6 stars!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 6 stars I would! I wish I had taken before pictures. This is miracle cream! Our American bully has suffered extreme nose dryness/scabiness, irritated toenails, scratchy exteriors to her ears, dryness in her folds..... This cream cleared EVERYTHING up in just one or two applications! This will be a staple in our house from now on. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have an olde english bulldogge who has a lot of allergies and his face wrinkles usually get irritated in the Spring. I used this on his problem wrinkles and within two days the redness was gone and he was back to his happy self! I will recommend this to anyone who has a pet this wrinkles. It has the consistency of a diaper rash cream and did not bother him at all to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A product that works on our English Bulldog!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 10 week old English Bulldog who has overactive tear ducts. He has staining and his folds/wrinkles below his eyes were kind of stinky. After using the Squishface wrinkle paste for about a week, our puppy has no more stinky folds/wrinkles. Before every use, we washed and dried his wrinkles/folds before applying the wrinkle paste. I would say that we are quite pleased with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Nava

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Wrinkle past is the best product ever!!!! I have tried many other products in the past and nothing had worked for me until now!!! I love it!!! Really works in my english bulldog! Today I showed it to my vet and she was surprise!!! she will be recommend it to her patients ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ely G.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have a bully and she gets reoccurring irritation in her wrinkles. This is the only product that helps with that and takes care of tear stains. Can definitely see a difference. Normally I don’t write reviews but I know it’s hard to find things that work for the wrinkly friends so I’d figure I’d share to help those that are looking for an effective product. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Noemy Zamarripa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pugs
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products you don't even know you need - until you have a Pug and then you do. It's a simple cream that eases that 'itchy' face in their cute little wrinkles. My Pug puppy has stopped using corners to scratch in between all of those wrinkles so it seems to work and has helped him relax and grow.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Totally makes my old english pups tears vamoose! I don't know why people are saying it's so expensive the stuff lasts a long time. You only need a little bit of it. Like the other reviews say, just a pea sized squirt under each eye. It works great. For real. You don't need to use it all the time it's like the Mr clean magic eraser for their face. I'll definitely repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: I think this works great! It’s super thick though so difficult to apply. For me anyway. And you need to be consistent with it. I’m bad at that part.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaBills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wrinkle cream for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my bulldog. Hard to clean the tear stains in his facial folds, but even after several days of daily use, you can see a major difference. Really no scent, thick and easy cream to apply. I recommend applying it at night before bedtime so that it can be washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Gurpreet

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle paste works!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using wrinkle paste for one year on our EBD. He has issues with redness and rashes in his wrinkles especially in the summertime. Wrinkle paste helps take the redness out and cools the irritation down. We love this product and recommend it to our bulldog friends! - Handsome.Hanley
customer_reviews.author: Clvl6

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my Frenchie had redness in his wrinkles and was scrubbing his face to itch it. The wrinkle paste was easy to use and had an effect after the first application. He has a black mask and I was concerned that the zinc would leave white marks on his face, but it only takes a small amount and it rubs in well. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Worked over night
customer_reviews.text: Our English bulldog came to us at 3 years old. One of her face wrinkles was endlessly wet and tear stained. Every morning and night I’d wipe her wrinkles. There would always be a lot of moisture and a very light brown goop (no smell, just wet tear stain/eye goop getting caught in there). With only 1 application of squish face wrinkle paste at night, the very next morning that fold was dry. No brown goop, no wetness and even the tear stain had lightened. Was completely surprised how quick it worked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use in theory than actually using on my pug.
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to get out of the tube and use on my pugs folds without making a mess and fear of getting in eyes. Perhaps a better applicator tip would help? Seems like a good product and may have worded well I just could not apply it with my particular pug and her deep folds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my bulldog!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my bulldog Sophie! She had red irritated skin in her tear stained faced wrinkles. I noticed a difference with the first use- no stinky smell, discoloration is almost completely gone and skin irritation is less. Today was the second use and it looks even better! Paste is super thick, easy to use and seems to work great! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TEllaC

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Using this for the third day & must say it works better than I thought. Our English bulldog had gotten a sore in the wrinkle below her left eye. Well ordered this squish face cream & lo and behold it's clearing the sore up, something the vet couldn't do with the treatment he was giving to our dog. I definitely will recommend to my friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Tovar

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this product can make!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I started using this on my 2 year old English bulldog about 2 weeks ago and the results have been astonishing. Before she would get brown gunk under the rope of her nose and now nothing. She has a white face and one of her wrinkles below her eyes would turn green like she was growing algae. I would clean this all the time and couldnt get it to go away. 2 days after the first application the green turned brown and now it is almost completely white again. This is a great product and I would highly recommend it to anyone with a wrinkled face dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. Womble

customer_reviews.title: ... dog's eye stains for two weeks and they look great now and don't have any crud buildup
customer_reviews.text: use it on my dog's eye stains for two weeks and they look great now and don't have any crud buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and I started to see a deference I will update if anything changes. I know my Frenchie and when ii first put it on him you could tell he loved it. It is a descent size for the price . And amazon has been the cheapest to find and have it delivered the next day! So... 3 days later and he is no longer scratching his face vigorously how he was and he stays very calm when I put the product on him. It’s working so far! After a month... This shyt really works really that’s all I have to say
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Squishface is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Squishface is AMAZING !! I have a 6 month old French Bulldog who began to have watery eyes due to pollen. We live in Savannah, Ga where pollen season starts at the beginning of March and his poor face began to get very red and irritated. After just two applications ALL the swelling went away. I’ve been been using Squishface once a day for a little over a month now and my little Bully no longer has any irritation in his face folds and no tear stains! Thank you so much for this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Running Momma

customer_reviews.title: His nose seems to itch him constantly and he rubs his face on blankets which gets everything dirty in our house
customer_reviews.text: My pug has gunk that builds up in his nasal folds. The vet gave us a wipes to clean it, but it does not seem to make a difference. His nose seems to itch him constantly and he rubs his face on blankets which gets everything dirty in our house. This cream has really helped however. It seems to dry out the gunk but not over dry his skin. There has been a 75% improvement in his nose and all the gross discharge he smears everywhere. He does not like when I put it in the creases with a q-tip but beyond that, he tolerates it. No smell or reaction (like it bothering him) at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have definitely noticed a difference with my bulldog puppy. He was getting very stinky and the scent was coming from his face wrinkles for sure, but I started using this wrinkle paste daily according to the instructions and it has made a noticeable difference. (First picture is the BEFORE Second picture is the AFTER) Also, I purchased the shampoo that is recommended by other reviews called Healthy Breeds Smelly Dog Shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pugs!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually one to write a review, however this product was worth every penny! Our pug’s nose fold was swollen, red, and itchy. After just one use, our pug’s face has already started looking better and the swelling has went down! There is no smell to this product and I would use all of the ingredients on my own body. Although our dog doesn’t like to get the cream rubbed on her, she does seem to tolerate the product on her face without attempting to lick it or “rub” it off. If your pug is having issues with their nose fold, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DB61017

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for 3 days and see a marked difference in my bulldogs rope area. The tear stains are improved but will need a little more time for a big difference. This is expensive but he has stopped itching his face as much so i feel it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Greene

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Try Coconut Oil.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Frenchie. It’s overpriced diaper rash cream. Tried it once and was very thick to put on, hard to get on the skin past the fur...so I went back to coconut oil because it melts as you put it on and you can easily rub it in.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFFFFF!
customer_reviews.text: Our French bulldog has allergies which causes his eyes to constantly be watery all of the time. Which of course results in his tear stains and some hair loss in those areas when it is peak season. This stuff worked on him in a day or two. Tear stains gone and hair growing back. No more irritation for our little guy. Happy dog = happy owner! Will be ordering again and recommending this product to all other bulldog owners!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: This product is literally amazing! My bulldogs folds and skin Allergies which were ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is literally amazing! My bulldogs folds and skin Allergies which were causing him really bad flare ups around his penis area cleared up instantly and his folds have never looked better! I truly wish I had a before and after picture! Highly highly recommend it! Thank you for making such a wonderful product that truly has help our Bully feel much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 yr old Frenchie. She is prone to allergies that cause her eyes to get gunky in the spring and summer. Giving her allergy medicine just wasn't enough to help. The eye gunk would sit in her skin folds if I wasn't constantly wiping her face. In between her face folds it would get inflamed and pink. I discovered this cream and it really helps calm her skin down. So I'm continuing giving her allergy medicine and using this everyday no more inflammation! A little dab goes a long way. I only wish I found this product sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was concerned about the size of the bottle. It may be smaller, but don’t let that deter you because you only need a little dab each application. As other reviewers have mentioned, I am careful not to get the product into my dogs eyes. It seems to work well if used in a consistent regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip and Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice!!!
customer_reviews.text: This new product they claim helps...is not rite with their GROOVE"" It does not heal...& The cleaning should be done with a soap for Dogs & Rinsings the baffles with Water, Then Drying them well!!!!! Before adding a Medicine...This Crud.covers the baffles Thick & paste that does not soak into the areas well & or easy & comes off very easy so in my opinions it does not get the job done it promotes,it's a mess ,& any one who has the baffles of their Dogs it's unsettling & painful for them So they don't want you putting a puddy of thick crud on them...That does notta!! So look for a proven rated.baffle review before buying things...Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Cole Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the product and used for 1 week and continue doing till 15 days but in fact instead of tear stain to lighting it keep darkening. Tried to Return the product through the pick up option - no knock or any update from the ups guys and left the strip on the door on calling UPS they asked to call Amazon. On contact amazon asked to call UPS too much mess and now it’s 30 days passed and I wasted my time and money.....
customer_reviews.author: KJshah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because no one I knew had used this product before and I REALLY didn’t want to spend so much money on a tiny bottle. We used this 3 times and it made such a huge difference for our 7 month old bulldog, I wish I had taken pictures. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SMiller

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is a thick cream that stays and works in well for your dog's fur. Easy to keep out of their eyes, since it is thicker and easy to control. Consistent use is the key to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie HAD red tear stains and after a day of applying they were gone. Granted I didn’t wait til they got horrible before I started applying. Also not the easiest thing to apply around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kurgan

customer_reviews.title: I have to use a bit longer to give a true review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using dipper cream for years on my Bulldogs and thought it worked well. I ordered squishface wrinkle paste a short while ago and so far it is working very well.i do think it is a bit pricey compared to what I have been using in the past ,but like I said I just started using it so I will have to try it for a wall before I can give a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars because it did help a little on my dogs tear stains I use it on their feet in between their toes and when their eyes are running I use it to prevent infection. Good product. Will keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: julie s.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Our bulldog had red and sore face wrinkles with tear stains. We tried other products to keep them clean but nothing worked as well as this does. Within 48 hours and 2 applications the redness was gone as was the dark brown stains (his face is white). We washed, dried and applied, then watched him closely so he wouldn't rub it off his face. We no longer use daily but weekly on the days he goes to day care to fight bacteria. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Try this paste it works
customer_reviews.text: New to EB breed but this is the best for their wrinkles by far! I’ve tried a few other brands but after 2 days his tear stains and raw skin have healed! Will definitely use this paste again once I’m out. Wish this was the first one I tried but the price is high so I tried other types first. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my pug!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my pug with a wrinkle infection. We clean his wrinkles, but somehow it still wouldn’t go away. They were oozing and he would lose hair everytime i would clean them. After two applies they finally stopped being moist! And now it looks like its getting better! Grateful for this product, since taking him to the vet and getting meds would of cost waaay more!! Update: after a few uses i noticed the cap wouldn’t stay on right. So it’s been hard to use the rest since it’s so dry and thick, i’ve literally had to stand on it to get any out.): really liked how it worked for our pug, just wish they had better packaging!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for my frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is miracle cream! My frenchie has a fairly deep tail pocket and it got crusty and stinky in one day. Ordered the squish face and within two applications, his tail is no longer stinky or a crusty oozy mess. I would recommend this to anyone who has a dog with a tail pocket, keeps it clean and dry and not stinky!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Neilan

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I discovered this product I was just cleaning my English bulldogs too nose wrinkle with warm water and a rag, it didn’t help her face smelled terrible and when I would clean it, it was always brown buildup, now her face never smells and it’s so dry and clean! This Product has changed our lives!
customer_reviews.author: teal

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: My Bulldogs wrinkles cleared up in 3 days. Worked great on her chin also. Do make sure to mix it up. Was all "watery" the first day. Works, feels, and smells just like Desitin baby diaper cream.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: My review on eye paste.
customer_reviews.text: I have a maltipoo...so he is white & his tears do stain around his eyes. After he is groomed he looks great, but the hair around his eyes grows back and the staining goes on. I have used the paste x2 & it does appear to help with keeping the hair cleaner looking. I will continue to use & will report back. I gave it a 4 for easy to use since (Chance) does not like anything near his eyes... too soon to give you a 5 on value. More to come....
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that WORKS for tear stains!
customer_reviews.text: It has only been three days and my toy morkie's tear stains are nearly gone. I have tried angel eyes as well as other supplements, the burts bees liquid and nothing has worked as well as this. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Randi McKinney

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cream for my pug with a deep wrinkle that often gets gross, after reading tons of great reviews. It feels weird to leave quite a bit IN the wrinkle while it's working, but in a matter of days it looked 10x better! We'll continue to have this on hand just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Isn't helping at all
customer_reviews.text: This hasn't worked for me, Ive used it exactly as directed but after 2 weeks I've noticed no change in the tear stains on my bullys face. In fact, I think it's getting worse. It's very easy to use, my puppy doesn't mind it at all. I'm not sure if it will help more once she's done teething or not? She's 6 months old now so hopefully she will have all her adult teeth soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good prouduct
customer_reviews.text: Got some from the breeder we got our english bulldog from and she uses this for her dogs. I use this daily after I clean our dogs folds and it keeps her comfortable. I clean the folds and put the squishy face on Dolly it is helping clear her yeast and tear stains .
customer_reviews.author: BethAnn

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for pug wrinkle care
customer_reviews.text: My pug has ongoing issue with her wrinkles. I clean them several time a week but they still get red and irritated. She has an ongoing issue with her wrinkles. So when I saw this cream I decided to try it based on the review. I was NOT DISAPPOINTED!! WITHIN 2 day the redness and and irritation had cleared up. She has stopped rubbing her face into her pillow now. Thanks for making such a wonderful product. I love that it doesn't take much to use. So I know it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: English Bulldog's Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: This is what I use for my English Bulldogs wrinkles. He has big nose wrinkle that holds in alot of dirt and bacteria..nothing else worked like this product. Use baby wipe and clean dirt and debris out of wrinkles ..then apply.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Jo

customer_reviews.title: Above my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. My Bulldogs wrinkles were red, a little swollen,and get was constantly rubbing them, even when I cleaned them out daily. I used this paste exactly as the directions stated and it was night and day. Our fifth application was about a week ago, and his wrinkles are still white as snow with zero irritation. Will 100% be buying again and recommending. I would show before and after pictures, but I'm not sure how on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product
customer_reviews.text: Got product, opened and squeezed. Clear liquid came out with swirl of white. Example- squeeze mustard bottle and all the runny water comes out first. Have to shake. I shook product still same. Did not see an expiration date on product. Smelled ok, but was Leary about placing in pups folds. Product is described as being a paste. I just wrote off as throw away. Will get something from vet
customer_reviews.author: Suzan P Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Tear stain savior
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often write reviews but this stuff has really helped my little rescue Maltese. He’s got allergies and he eyes tear so badly that they can get raw where his tear stains are. Combined with daily wipes, this paste is helping sooth his skin and seems to help prevent any bacteria or fungus taking root in the moisture. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wattley

customer_reviews.title: Probably Great for Wrinkle faces but didn’t work well for Tears
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product for my Maltese mix hoping to finally put a end to the rusty brown tear stains. It’s kinda greasy feeling and sticks to the fur, it helped keep her face dry but didn’t help much with tear stains in general. Kept using until the bottle was empty but was little result. Likely best for dogs with wrinkle faces
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Works like a miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a English Bulldog with lots of skin issues. This stuff works so quickly on her nose crinkles. Pretty much over night results! Best stuff I have purchased for her yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lehmann

product_meta.title: Squishface Wrinkle Paste - Cleans Wrinkles, Tear Stains and Tail Pockets - 2 Oz, Anti-Itch, Great for Bulldogs, Pugs and Frenchies
feature_bullets: CHECK OUT OUR NEW LOOK! - Wrinkle Paste Cleans and Protects your Dog's Wrinkles, Tear Stains and Tail Pocket
Antibacterial & Anti-fungal - Wrinkle Paste Forms a Water Repellent Barrier that Helps to Keep Moisture, Fungus & Bacteria at Bay
Minimal Ingredient List - (with Limited Plant Based Ingredients) So Even the Most Sensitive or Allergy Prone Pet Can Use It
Works Great for All Dogs! - English Bulldogs, Frenchies, Olde English Bulldogges, Pugs, American Bulldogs, Shar-peis, Mastiffs, and even long-haired breeds like Poodles, Shih-tzu’s and Pomeranians!

Fast Acting! - While Some People See a Significant Improvement within 2-3 Days, We Recommend Cleaning the Area of Debris and Applying Fresh Wrinkle Paste Once Daily for 5-6 Days Continuously for Best Results
